Package ludoGame

Class Spot

java.lang.Object
ludoGame.Spot
public class Spot extends Object
Responsible for drawing rectangular and circular spots onto the board to support pawn movement.
Author:
Saleem Carter, Reggie Andrade

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Spot(double x, double y, String type, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
    Default constructor to construct a spot onto the GraphicsContext (non-clickable)
    Spot(double x, double y, javafx.scene.layout.Pane p)
    Overloaded Spot constructor to create a blank white square spot.

  • Constructor Details

    • Spot

      public Spot(double x, double y, String type, javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Default constructor to construct a spot onto the GraphicsContext (non-clickable)
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the spot
      y - The y-coordinate of the spot
      type - The type of spot ("home" or "final")
      gc - The GraphicsContext to draw to

    • Spot

      public Spot(double x, double y, javafx.scene.layout.Pane p)
      Overloaded Spot constructor to create a blank white square spot. Used as a base for safe spots, start spots, and home stretch spots. Draws the spot onto a Pane to allow clicking interaction.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the spot
      y - The y-coordinate of the spot
      p - The pane to draw the spot onto.

  • Method Details

    • addArrow

      public void addArrow(int angle)
      Method to add an arrow to the spot. Used for start spots.
      Parameters:
      angle - The angle to draw the arrow at

    • addStar

      public void addStar()
      Method to add a star to the spot. Used for safe spots.

    • setHomeStrechColor

      public void setHomeStrechColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color clr)

      public double getX()
      Gets the X coordinate of the spot

      Returns:

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the spot (ex. "safe", "neutral")
      Returns:
      X-coordinate

    • getSize

      public double getSize()
      Gets the size of each spot
      Returns:
      Size of the spot

    • setType

      public void setType(String type)
      Sets type of the spot
      Parameters:
      type - The type to change the spot to

    • getRectangle

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getRectangle()
      Gets the rectangle object of the spot. Will return null if the spot is circular.
      Returns:
      Rectangle object
